section.title: Expense Item Setup
section.para: The Project Item Setup tab is an extension of the standard Item maintenance screen. Expense Items are used to create a relationship between a specified Reference Item and a General Ledger (G/L) Account or an Expense Category. These relationships are critical to the Vouchering functionality that is a feature of the Time and Expense Pro version. To access the list of Items, follow this path: Products > Item > List. Click on the Project tab to view expense setup. The following screen will appear:

note.para: The Project tab is only available for Reference item types.

section.para: The Project tab provides the ability to select a related Account or Expense Category.

varlistentry.term: Allow use as Expense Item on Projects

listitem.para: Select this check box if you want to use this item for project expenses.

Identify a General Ledger (G/L) Account to be used for expensing Purchasing Expenses to. This is an Expense Account. This Account will be used to create distributions when Vouchering expense lines. The account will be debited when the Voucher is posted.

Identify an Expense Category to distribute Purchasing Expenses to. The Expense Category is used to define a set of General Ledger (G/L) Accounts related to an expense. This Account will be used to create distributions when Vouchering expense lines. The account will be debited when the Voucher is posted.
